jmx:method.name: getBundleInfo
jmx:method.description: Retrieves informations about the bundle with the given ID, null if not found

jmx:method.name: getBundlesState
jmx:method.description: Retrieves a Map<String, int> associating bundles ID and state

jmx:method.name: installBundle
jmx:method.description: Install the given bundle (needs a valid URL) and returns its ID. Throws a BundleException on error

jmx:method.name: startBundle
jmx:method.description: Starts the bundle with the given UID

jmx:method.name: stopBundle
jmx:method.description: Stops the bundle with the given UID

jmx:method.name: uninstallBundle
jmx:method.description: Uninstalls the bundle with the given UID

jmx:method.name: updateBundle
jmx:method.description: Updates the bundle with the given UID
